reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas comfortable and easy to sleep in, with a silky feel that becomes super soft after washing. The material quality receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's neither too thin nor too thick. Customers like the color, with one mentioning it looks expensive, and appreciate the length of the shorts. Regarding size, while some find the size spot on, others mention the bottoms run s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look good, feel good, easy care satin fabric - highly recommend
items.body: Love these pj's! The sizing was accurate. They're loose enough to be very comfortable without being too big. The color has stayed true through washing, and the pj's still look new. they did not wrinkle or shrink. I washed them with my regular laundry and dried them on the low setting. The only down side: no pockets in the pants. There is a small pocket on the top, and that is enough for a tissue. The description of these pj's is accurate. They are attractive, comfortable and wash/dry well. I'll probably buy more in different colors. Read more
items.author: L. Brock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pajamas for a perfect nights sleep üåπ
items.body: Very surprised when I opened the package! Soft and silky and the color was soft and shiny. Well made and matching trim attractive. Comfortable and fit perfectly. I have washed them according to manufacturer directions and came out perfect. No shrinkage. Fabric perfect weight. These are a winner! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars a great item
items.body: My fianc√©e tried these Ekouaer silk pajamas a few nights ago ‚Äî and after the first wear she told me she‚Äôd never felt something so soft and comfy. The satin material feels silky smooth against the skin and drapes effortlessly ‚Äî not clingy or cheap-feeling at all. One night, she wore it after a long day of work and just relaxed on the sofa. Even under the living room light, the pajamas looked classy, with a subtle sheen that doesn‚Äôt scream ‚Äúsleepwear‚Äù but more like an elegant lounge outfit. She said they made her feel comfortable and a bit special ‚Äî like she was treating herself to something nice after a tiring day. Washing them was easy too ‚Äî after the wash cycle, the fabric stayed soft and didn‚Äôt lose its shine or shape. No pilling, no stiffness. If you want sleepwear or loungewear that feels luxurious yet comfortable ‚Äî great for home, relaxing evenings, or even a comfy night‚Äôs sleep ‚Äî this Ekouaer satin pajama set is a solid pick Read more
items.author: Er

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable well made pajamas!
items.body: I love these pajamas! They are so cute and so comfortable! They are well made and have lasted for a while now. The only reason for 4 stars is the run a little small. You might want to order up a size if unsure. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product
items.body: Love them, so comfy and silky! Still have after a year so they wear well!! Definitely recommend Read more
items.author: Lisa Hoffer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rust
items.body: Nice material and fits well. The color gives more of an orange/rust color. Read more
items.author: Anica Hurst

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute and comfy
items.body: these are sourer cute and comfortable. the shorts seem a bit smaller than the size, ut they are cute on, the top was a tad bigger than size but is comfortable, the satin seems like a nice quality and thy look and feel great. I hav ent washed them yet, but I am happy with this purchase Read more
items.author: Jill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good
items.body: Wife loves them. Size is true and she states they are very comfortable and breathable. Read more
items.author: P. Stephens

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Parrot Garden, Shamrock, Red Heart, Zebra, Blue-white Stripes, Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Champagne, Grey Owl, Pink Wine Glass, Rose Red, A-green Santa Claus, Lavender. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
